(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN market))
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (DT a) (NNP GPS))))
          (, ,))))))


mark(are-3, If-1)
nsubj(are-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, are-3)
prep(are-3, in-4)
det(market-6, the-5)
pobj(in-4, market-6)
prep(market-6, for-7)
det(GPS-9, a-8)
pobj(for-7, GPS-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB then))
    (NP (DT the) (JJ new) (NNP Garmin-Asus) (NNP Nuvifone))
    (VP (MD might)
      (VP (VB be)
        (NP
          (NP (NN something))
          (SBAR
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (MD would)
                (VP (VB want)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB consider)))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (NNP Garmin))
        (SBAR (IN as)
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP know)))))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN market) (NN leader))
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (NNP GPS) (NNS devices))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP they))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (JJ solid) (NN reputation))
          (PP (IN for)
            (S
              (VP (VBG delivering)
                (NP (DT the) (RBS most) (JJ reliable) (NNP GPS) (NNS devices))
                (ADVP (RB around))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (SBAR
      (WHNP (WP What))
      (S
        (NP (PRP they))
        (VP (VBP have)
          (VP (VBN done)))))

      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB incorporate)
            (NP (NNP ASUS) (NNP PDA) (NN phone) (NNS technologies))

              (NP (PRP$ their) (NNP GPS) (NN device)))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB create)
                  (NP (DT a) (NNP GPS) (NN phone)))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (MD might)
      (VP (VB be)
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ useful)
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP
              (NP
                (NP (NNS parents))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WP who))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBP want)
                      (S
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB know)

                              (NP
                                (NP (PRP$ their) (NN kid) (POS 's))
                                (NNS wherabouts))))))))))
              (CC or)
              (NP
                (NP (RB even) (NNS girlfriends))

                  (WHNP (WP who))

                        (VP (TO to)

                            (SBAR
                              (WHADVP (WRB where))

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ My) (JJ first) (NN impression))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (DT this))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADVP (RB really))
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN phone))
              (VP (VBN designed)
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP

                      (WHNP (WP who))

det(phone-20, a-19)
dobj(getting-18, phone-20)
nsubjpass(used-24, which-21)
aux(used-24, can-22)
auxpass(used-24, be-23)
rcmod(phone-20, used-24)
prep(used-24, as-25)
det(GPS-27, a-26)
pobj(as-25, GPS-27)
advmod(well-29, as-28)
advmod(used-24, well-29)
